events.message: At approximately 7:45 AM, my vehicle was involved in a collision with another car at the intersection of 5th and Elm. I am filing a claim to cover the damages sustained.
The claim has been reviewed and categorized under the 'Auto Accident' cluster due to reports of a collision and vehicle damages.
An agent has been assigned to handle your auto accident claim and will contact you shortly for further information.
Your claim regarding the car accident has been acknowledged, and we appreciate your prompt reporting of the incident.
Please provide the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation.
The requested documents including the police report and multiple photos of the damaged car parts have been submitted successfully.
Our investigation team has begun reviewing all submitted evidence and statements to determine fault and assess damage.
The investigation has been completed, confirming the liability of the other driver and estimating repair costs for your vehicle.
A settlement proposal covering the full repair costs plus a rental car allowance during the repair period has been sent for your review.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated timely communication throughout the process.
Following customer approval, the claim has been officially approved and is ready for the payment issuance phase.
Payment for the approved claim, including repair costs and rental reimbursement, has been issued to the customer's account.
The claim has been closed after successful payment and confirmation that the repairs were completed to the customer's satisfaction.
All records related to this auto accident claim have been archived in compliance with company and regulatory policies.
